JOB DESCRIPTION: As a full stack developer, you will be working in partnership with the product team to develop new customer-facing functionality on our consumer applications and platforms. You will be tasked with the technical design, implementation and maintenance of the features you will be developing, as well as assisting with the daily operations of our systems.      Responsibilities:      Analyze, design and develop tests and test-automation suites.   Design and develop web application build, testing, and deployment processes.   Provide ongoing maintenance, support, and enhancements in existing systems and platforms.   Collaborate cross-functionally with data scientists, business users, project managers, and other engineers to efficiently deliver software solutions.   Work alongside other engineers on the team to elevate technology and consistently apply best practices.      Skills    MongoDB , SCSS / SASS, HTML5 CSS3, React.js, AWS, NodeJS, Angular, Angular/NgRx    1.8L 3.6L No equity    We are looking for a Technical Content writer to produce high-quality documentation that contributes to the overall success of our products.   Work with technical staff to make products easier to use and thus need fewer instructions.   Strong communication skills, writing skills, technical skills, detail-oriented and mainly ability to design and develop technical information in a well-structured manner
